page.title: 09LOCAL AFFAIRS
page.content:
{CUSTOMS { Beech Hill has three traditions: an annual fayre which is held on the 10th of August; a flower show, held annually and a hunt which meets every winter.
{LIFESTYLE { Most of the inhabitants of Beech Hill appear to be rich. Sir Peter Cadbury, owner of Cadbury's chocolate, used to live in Trunkwell House. A top breeder of hunting dogs also lives in Beech Hill.
{POLITICS
Beech Hill has a parish council and is governed by Mortimer town coucil. It has an electral role of 38 people.
